46 Lotz, The Champagne Spy

Lotz suggests three scenarios to explain why the Egyptians did not reveal his identity: (1) they actually believed his legend; (2) relations between Egypt and West Germany were at a low ebb: therefore, it was in Egyptian interests to aggravate those tensions by highlighting Lotz’s supposed past in the SS; (3) the Egyptian authorities might have been embarrassed by the fact that they had not uncovered these important details themselves
